```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(psych)
library(mice)
library(FactoMineR)
library(mice)
```

```{r}
mics <- read_csv("datasets/mics_imputed.csv")
skimr::skim(mics)
```

```{r}
columns_to_exclude = c("HH1", "HH2", "wmweight", "PSU", "stratum")

mics <- mics %>%
  mutate(across(-all_of(columns_to_exclude), as.ordered))
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(mics)
```
```{r}
head(mics)
```
